overview:
Harold Goldberg was formerly CEO of Zend Technologies. Goldberg brought more than 20 years experience in senior marketing, strategy and sales roles at top-tier organizations to Zend.

Prior to Zend, Goldberg was Senior Vice President of Worldwide Marketing and Corporate Strategy for BMC Software. Goldberg joined BMC as Vice President of Worldwide Marketing and Business Strategy for Remedy, where he played a key role in BMC’s acquisitions of Magic Solutions, Marimba and Viadyne â€“ and in Remedy’s acquisition by BMC.

While at Remedy, Goldberg was instrumental in developing and executing the division’s Merger & Acquisition strategy and all strategic relationships with partners, investors, customers and suppliers. Previously, he spent time at Siemens Information and Communication Networks, Peregrine Systems, Ring Medical, Inc. (now Notify M.S.) and Sudbury Systems.

Goldberg received a Bachelor of Arts degree in Business Administration, Marketing and Political Sciences from the University of Manitoba in Winnipeg, and a Master of Arts in International Political Economics from New York University in New York City.
